name: Crowd Control (itch) (6E23)
description:
An infection is spreading...

It's up to you to prevent a pandemic! In Crowd Control it's your job to maintain social distancing by keeping the infected away from the healthy. Who's sick? Who knows... Each game starts with a certain number of sick people whose sneezing will infect anybody within close proximity.  The less infected by the end of the timer, the higher the score!

But watch out- things might get ugly...

This game was made in 48 hours as part of the GMTK 2020 Game Jam with the theme "Out of Control".

CONTROLS

Left click to select and move people

Right click to cancel a selection

R to restart a level

CREDITS

Art: @meiveee on Instagram

Coding: @6e23games on Twitter
